and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H2022>'Mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God!<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God<s%> to the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> the <S%H1389>hills,<s%> the <S%H650>ravines<s%> and the <S%H1516>valleys:<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I <S%H589>Myself<s%> am going to <S%H935>bring<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> on you, and I will destroy your <S%H6>high<s%> <S%H1116>places.<s%>

"In <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H4186>dwellings,<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> will <S%H2717>become<s%> <S%H2717>waste<s%> and the <S%H1116>high<s%> <S%H1116>places<s%> will be <S%H8074>desolate,<s%> that your <S%H4196>altars<s%> may <S%H2717>become<s%> <S%H2717>waste<s%> and <S%H816>desolate,<s%> your <S%H1544>idols<s%> may be <S%H7665>broken<s%> and <S%H7673>brought<s%> to an <S%H7673>end,<s%> your <S%H2553>incense<s%> <S%H2553>altars<s%> may be <S%H1438>cut<s%> <S%H1438>down,<s%> and your <S%H4639>works<s%> may be <S%H4229>blotted<s%> out.

"Then those of you <S%H6412>who<s%> <S%H6412>escape<s%> will <S%H2142>remember<s%> Me among the <S%H1471>nations<s%> to <S%H834>which<s%> they will be <S%H7617>carried<s%> <S%H7617>captive,<s%> <S%H834>how<s%> I have been <S%H7665>hurt<s%> by their <S%H2181>adulterous<s%> <S%H3820>hearts<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H5493>turned<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> from Me, and by their <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> which <S%H2181>played<s%> the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> their <S%H1544>idols;<s%> and they will <S%H6962>loathe<s%> themselves in their own <S%H6440>sight<s%> for the <S%H9567>evils<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they have <S%H6213>committed,<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H8441>abominations.<s%>

<S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H5221>'Clap<s%> your <S%H3709>hand,<s%> <S%H7554>stamp<s%> your <S%H7272>foot,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H253>"Alas,<s%> <S%H413>because<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H8441>abominations<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> will <S%H5307>fall<s%> by <S%H2719>sword,<s%> <S%H7458>famine,<s%> and <S%H1698>plague!<s%>

"So throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H4186>habitations<s%> I shall <S%H5186>stretch<s%> out My <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> them and <S%H5414>make<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H4480>more<s%> <S%H8077>desolate<s%> and <S%H4923>waste<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> toward <S%H1689>Diblah;<s%> thus they will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>"' "
